metadata.title: CVE-2022-31630 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP versions prior to 7.4.33, 8.0.25 and 8.2.12, when usingimageloadfont() function in gd extension, it is possible to supply aspecially crafted font file, such as if the loaded font is used withimagechar() function, the read outside allocated buffer will be used. Thiscan lead to crashes or disclosure of confidential information.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
